pages.text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen bici jian chengli dingqi jiedai de shihou, nimen yingdang xie yi zhang jie quan, qing yige hui xiezi de ren, binggong dai xie. Dai shu ren bude jujue, dang zunzhao zhenzhu suo jiao ta de fangfa er shuxie. You zhaiwu zhe koushou,(ta koushou shi), dang jingwei zhenzhu ──ta de zhu ──buyao jianshao zhai e yi sihao. Ruguo zhaiwu zhe shi yuchun de, huo lao ruo de, huo buneng qinzi koushou de, namo, jiao ta de jianhuren binggong di ti ta koushou. Nimen dang cong nimen de nanren zhong yaoqing liang geren zuozheng; ruguo meiyou liang ge nanren, namo, cong nimen suo renke de zhengren zhong qing yige nanren he liang ge nuren zuozheng. Zhege nuren yiwang de shihou, nage nuren keyi tixing ta. Zhengren bei yaoqing de shihou, bude jujue. Wulun zhai e duogua, buke yanfan, dou yao xie zai jie
